Frank, If you were able to modify it then it's the older model. The new 47=
0's can not be modified. YET! I have 4 of them and two had a blue wire and =
two had a light green wireboth where 7th wire from the top if you have the =
board turned over. I'm attaching a pic of the older model I just did a sess=
ion with mine this morning. fantastic! Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To: evp-itc@=
yahoogroups.comFrom: franks-boxes@...: Wed, 2 Jan 2008 10:22:37=
 -0700Subject: [EVP-ITC] The '470 mod?



 I have the '470, but I don't kno=
w if it's the older one or not. I was able to modify it, but it was somewha=
t different than in the video instruction, there was more than one green wi=
re. You have to lift the top board so you can see the wire connections on t=
he other board, they are labeled, and you can tell what wire to cut/unsolde=
r.  (mute wire).   Frank-S
